incidents.name: TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification and Short Codes, PN Provisioning, Pricing Page API and Flex Studio Systems are Impacted

incident_updates.body: The TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, Short Codes system, PN Provisioning, and Flex Studio are fully functional again. This incident has been resolved.

We have been informed that a fix is implemented and the TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, Short Codes system, PN provisioning, and Flex Studio are functional again. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers attempting to access TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, and Short Codes systems will receive 5xx in the console and API. Additionally, PN provisioning and Flex Studio are also impacted. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers attempting to access TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, and Short Codes systems will receive 5xx in the console and API. Additionally, PN provisioning and Flex Studio are also impacted. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Lookup API Returning Inconsistent Results

incident_updates.body: Twilio Lookup API was degraded for 47 days between June 8th 12:00 PM and July 25th 1:50 AM Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have experienced issues retrieving information in around 0.1% of API calls. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Lookup. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Twilio Programmable Messaging API

incident_updates.body: The Twilio Programmable Messaging API was partially degraded for 2 minutes on September 12, 2024 between 8:24am PST and 8:26am PST. During this period of time, customers may have received 5xx's in API responses when sending a message. This issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Issue with Inbound and Outbound Message Post Processing

incident_updates.body: Inbound and outbound message post processing issue has been resolved and it is operating normally at this time.

Inbound and outbound message post processing is now operating normally.   Customers may experience post processing delays with a small proportion of existing messages (for example Status Callbacks).  We will continue to monitor for system stability. Well provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Programmable Messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Movistar Network in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Movistar Network in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Movistar Network in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Movistar Network in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Movistar Network in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
